summary: A utility script that transforms model checkpoints produced by the Diffusers library into the original Stable Diffusion XL format, handling the conversion of text encoder, UNet, and VAE state dictionaries and adjusting tensor shapes as needed.
business_intent: Enable seamless migration of Diffusers-trained SDXL models to the native format required for deployment, fineâ€‘tuning, or integration with existing pipelines that expect original Stable Diffusion checkpoints.
